analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T0000
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_command_line contains "Get-History"  or process_command_line contains "AppData\\Roaming\\Microsoft\\Windows\\PowerShell\\PSReadline\\ConsoleHost_history.txt"  or process_command_line contains "(Get-PSReadlineOption).HistorySavePath")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T0000
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 17 and (pipe_name contains "\\isapi_http" or pipe_name contains "\\isapi_dg" or pipe_name contains "\\isapi_dg2" or pipe_name contains "\\isapi_http" or pipe_name contains "\\sdlrpc" or pipe_name contains "\\aheec" or pipe_name contains "\\winsession" or pipe_name contains "\\lsassw" or pipe_name contains "\\rpchlp_3" or pipe_name contains "\\NamePipe_MoreWindows" or pipe_name contains "\\pcheap_reuse" or pipe_name contains "\\PSEXESVC" or pipe_name contains "\\PowerShellISEPipeName_" or pipe_name contains "\\csexec" or pipe_name contains "\\paexec" or pipe_name contains "\\remcom")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T0000
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 17 and pipe_name contains "\\msagent_"

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T0000

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T0000

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T0000

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1002
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_path contains "powershell.exe"  and process_command_line contains "-Recurse | Compress-Archive")  or (process_path contains "rar.exe"  and process_command_line contains "rar*a*")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1003
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 7 and (module_loaded contains "C:\\Windows\\System32\\samlib.dll" or module_loaded contains "C:\\Windows\\System32\\WinSCard.dll" or module_loaded contains "C:\\Windows\\System32\\cryptdll.dll" or module_loaded contains "C:\\Windows\\System32\\hid.dll" or module_loaded contains "C:\\Windows\\System32\\vaultcli.dll") and (process_path !contains "\\Sysmon.exe" or process_path !contains "\\svchost.exe" or process_path !contains "\\logonui.exe")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1003
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_command_line contains "Invoke-Mimikatz -DumpCreds" or process_command_line contains "gsecdump -a" or process_command_line contains "wce -o" or process_command_line contains "procdump -ma lsass.exe" or process_command_line contains "ntdsutil*ac i ntds*ifm*create full")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1003
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 10 and target_process_path contains "C:\\Windows\\system32\\lsass.exe" and (process_granted_access contains "0x1010" or process_granted_access contains "0x1410" or process_granted_access contains "0x147a" or process_granted_access contains "0x143a") and process_call_trace contains "C:\\Windows\\SYSTEM32\\ntdll.dll" and process_call_trace contains "C:\\Windows\\system32\\KERNELBASE.dll" and process_call_trace contains "|UNKNOWN(*)"

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1003

analytics.query: Sysmon | where (EventID == 12 or EventID == 13 or EventID == 14) and process_path !contains "svchost.exe" and (registry_key_path contains "*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\EnterpriseCertificates\\Root\\Certificates\\*" or registry_key_path contains "*\\Microsoft\\SystemCertificates\\Root\\Certificates\\*")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1131
analytics.query: Sysmon | where (EventID == 12 or EventID == 13 or EventID == 14) and (registry_key_path contains "*\\SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Lsa\\*") and (process_path !contains "C:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\lsass.exe" or process_path !contains "C:\\Windows\\system32\\svchost.exe" or process_path !contains "C:\\Windows\\system32\\services.exe")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1135
analytics.query: Sysmon | where process_path contains "net.exe" and (process_command_line contains "view" or process_command_line contains "share")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1135
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_path contains "net.exe" and (process_command_line contains "net view" or process_command_line contains "net share")) or process_command_line contains "get-smbshare -Name"

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1136
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_command_line contains "New-LocalUser" or process_command_line contains "net user add")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1138
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 11 and file_name contains "C:\\Windows\\AppPatch\\Custom\\"

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1138
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and process_path contains "sdbinst.exe"

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1138
analytics.query: Sysmon | where (EventID == 12 or EventID == 13 or EventID == 14) and registry_key_path contains "\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\AppCompatFlags\\InstalledSDB\\"

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1140
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_path contains "certutil.exe" and process_command_line contains "decode")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1146
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_command_line contains "*rm (Get-PSReadlineOption).HistorySavePath*" or process_command_line contains "*del (Get-PSReadlineOption).HistorySavePath*" or process_command_line contains "*Set-PSReadlineOption -HistorySaveStyle SaveNothing*" or process_command_line contains "*Remove-Item (Get-PSReadlineOption).HistorySavePath*")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1158
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and process_path contains "attrib.exe" and (process_command_line contains "+h" or process_command_line contains "+s")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1158
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_path contains "*\\VolumeShadowCopy*\\*" or process_command_line contains "*\\VolumeShadowCopy*\\*")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1170
analytics.query: Sysmon | where (EventID == 11 or EventID == 15) and file_name contains ".hta"

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1170
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 3 and (process_command_line contains "mshta.exe" or process_parent_command_line contains "mshta.exe")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1170
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_command_line contains "mshta.exe" or process_parent_command_line contains "mshta.exe")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1179
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_path contains "mavinject.exe" or process_command_line contains "/INJECTRUNNING")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1180
analytics.query: Sysmon | where (EventID == 12 or EventID == 13 or EventID == 14) and (registry_key_path contains "*\\Control Panel\\Desktop\\SCRNSAVE.EXE") and (process_parent_command_line !contains "explorer.exe" or process_path !contains "rundll32.exe" or process_command_line !contains "*shell32.dll,Control_RunDLL desk.cpl,ScreenSaver,*")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1182
analytics.query: Sysmon | where (EventID == 12 or EventID == 13 or EventID == 14) and registry_key_path contains "\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Session Manager\\AppCertDlls\\"

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1183
analytics.query: Sysmon | where (EventID == 12 or EventID == 13 or EventID == 14) and (registry_key_path contains "\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\" or registry_key_path contains "\\Wow6432Node\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Image File Execution Options\\")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1187
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 11 and (file_name contains ".lnk" or file_name contains ".scf")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1191
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and process_path contains "CMSTP.exe"

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1196
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_command_line contains "control \\/name"  or process_command_line contains "rundll32 shell32.dll,Control_RunDLL")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1196
analytics.query: Sysmon | where (EventID == 12 or EventID == 13 or EventID == 14) and (registry_key_path contains "\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Explorer\\ControlPanel\\NameSpace" or registry_key_path contains "\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Controls Folder\\*\\Shellex\\PropertySheetHandlers\\" or registry_key_path contains "\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Control Panel\\")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1197
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 3 and process_path contains "bitsadmin.exe"

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1197
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_path contains "bitsamin.exe" or process_command_line contains "Start-BitsTransfer")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1201
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 11 and (process_command_line contains "net accounts" or process_command_line contains "net accounts \\/domain")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1202
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_parent_command_line contains "pcalua.exe" or process_path contains "pcalua.exe" or process_path contains "bash.exe" or process_path contains "forfiles.exe")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1209
analytics.query: Sysmon | where (EventID == 12 or EventID == 13 or EventID == 14) and registry_key_path contains "\\System\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\W32Time\\TimeProviders\\"

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1214
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_command_line contains "reg query HKLM \\/f password \\/t REG_SZ \\/s" or process_command_line contains "reg query HKCU \\/f password \\/t REG_SZ \\/s" or process_command_line contains "Get-UnattendedInstallFile" or process_command_line contains "Get-Webconfig" or process_command_line contains "Get-ApplicationHost" or process_command_line contains "Get-SiteListPassword" or process_command_line contains "Get-CachedGPPPassword" or process_command_line contains "Get-RegistryAutoLogon")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1216
analytics.query: Sysmon | where process_path contains "cscript" or process_path contains "wscript" or process_path contains "certutil" or process_path contains "jjs" and file_directory !contains " /nologo \"MonitorKnowledgeDiscovery.vbs\""

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1217
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_command_line contains "*firefox*places.sqlite*")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1218
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 3 and (process_path contains "certutil.exe" or process_command_line contains "*certutil*script\\:http\\[\\:\\]\\/\\/*" or process_path contains "*\\replace.exe")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1218
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and (process_command_line contains "mavinject*\\/injectrunning" or process_command_line contains "mavinject32*\\/injectrunning*" or process_command_line contains "*certutil*script\\:http\\[\\:\\]\\/\\/*" or process_command_line contains "*certutil*script\\:https\\[\\:\\]\\/\\/*" or process_command_line contains "*msiexec*http\\[\\:\\]\\/\\/*" or process_command_line contains "*msiexec*https\\[\\:\\]\\/\\/*")

analytics.description: Checks for execution of MITRE ATT&CK T1223
analytics.query: Sysmon | where EventID == 1 and process_path contains "hh.exe"
